attacks.name: Take Out
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon isn't an Evolved Pokémon, that Pokémon is Knocked Out instead of damaged by this attack.

attacks.name: Hurricane Punch
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.effect: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Machamp.
